attributes.additional_details: To show that the Government and Parliament do genuinely care about people of this country and are willing to take stance on this situation once and for all
attributes.background: All MP’s that were at the Christmas Party during COVID to resign and quit after the outrage they have caused the British public

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
